hadiths.text: Abd al-Rahman b. Abi Sa'id al-Khudri quotes his father as saying:The Prophet (ï·º) said: Washing and the use of tooth-stick are necessary for every adult (person) on Friday; and everyone should apply perfume whatever one has. The narrator Bukair did not mention of 'Abd al-Rahman; and about perfume he said that even it might be of the kind used by women
